quiz.question: Which claim about gluten-free diets is accurate?
options: Gluten-free diets cure all digestive issues
Everyone benefits from a gluten-free diet
Only people with celiac disease or sensitivity need gluten-free diets
quiz.answer: Only people with celiac disease or sensitivity need gluten-free diets

quiz.question: Which explanation about intermittent fasting and weight loss is accurate?
options: Intermittent fasting always outperforms calorie control for everyone
Intermittent fasting can aid weight loss but works primarily through calorie reduction
Fasting guarantees muscle gain without training
quiz.answer: Intermittent fasting can aid weight loss but works primarily through calorie reduction

quiz.question: Which documented public-health outcome followed anti-vaccine misinformation outbreaks?
options: Measles and pertussis outbreaks increased in areas with declining vaccination rates
Vaccine refusal eliminated infectious disease risk
Anti-vaccine messages had no impact on disease incidence
quiz.answer: Measles and pertussis outbreaks increased in areas with declining vaccination rates

quiz.question: Which claim about eating fat is supported by modern nutrition science?
options: Healthy fats are essential and can support weight management
Fat-free foods are always healthiest
All dietary fat directly causes obesity
quiz.answer: Healthy fats are essential and can support weight management

quiz.question: Which statement about charcoal detox pills reflects regulatory guidance?
options: Activated charcoal can interfere with medications and lacks broad detox evidence
Charcoal adds essential nutrients to the body
Activated charcoal supplements safely remove all internal toxins daily
quiz.answer: Activated charcoal can interfere with medications and lacks broad detox evidence

quiz.question: Which documented policy reduced false health claims in advertising historically?
options: Stricter advertising regulations and enforcement reduced misleading supplement claims in several jurisdictions
Regulators encouraged false health claims for economic growth
No regulation ever affected advertising practices
quiz.answer: Stricter advertising regulations and enforcement reduced misleading supplement claims in several jurisdictions

quiz.question: Which statement reflects the truth about vaccines and autism?
options: Only certain vaccines cause autism
Vaccines cause autism
Extensive research shows no causal link between vaccines and autism
quiz.answer: Extensive research shows no causal link between vaccines and autism

quiz.question: Which claim about consuming carrots and beta-carotene is accurate?
options: Beta-carotene poisoning causes immediate blindness
Excessive beta-carotene causes orange skin but not the same effects as vitamin A toxicity
Carrots contain dangerous levels of animal vitamin A
quiz.answer: Excessive beta-carotene causes orange skin but not the same effects as vitamin A toxicity

quiz.question: Which biochemical fact explains why cholesterol in eggs has limited impact for most people?
options: Dietary cholesterol is the sole determinant of blood cholesterol
Dietary cholesterol has a smaller effect on blood cholesterol than saturated fat in many individuals
Cholesterol from eggs evaporates during cooking
quiz.answer: Dietary cholesterol has a smaller effect on blood cholesterol than saturated fat in many individuals

quiz.question: Which idea about sleep needs is supported by research?
options: Individual sleep needs vary between about 6 and 9 hours for adults
Less than five hours is healthy for most adults
Everyone needs exactly eight hours of sleep nightly
quiz.answer: Individual sleep needs vary between about 6 and 9 hours for adults

quiz.question: Which claim about HPV vaccine and sexual behavior aligns with research?
options: HPV vaccination increases risky sexual behavior significantly
HPV vaccine eliminates the need for screening forever
Evidence does not show increased risky sexual behavior after HPV vaccination
quiz.answer: Evidence does not show increased risky sexual behavior after HPV vaccination

quiz.question: Which study type best challenges detox diet claims about toxin removal?
options: Detox claims are proven by randomized long-term mortality reductions
Anecdotal testimonials validate rapid toxin clearance
Controlled biochemical studies show no sustained increase in toxin elimination from short detox diets
quiz.answer: Controlled biochemical studies show no sustained increase in toxin elimination from short detox diets

quiz.question: Which claim about stretching before exercise is most accurate?
options: Static stretching always prevents injury before every workout
Stretching eliminates muscle soreness for days
Dynamic warm-ups better prepare muscles; static stretching has specific uses
quiz.answer: Dynamic warm-ups better prepare muscles; static stretching has specific uses

quiz.question: Which explanation fits the placebo effect in alternative therapies?
options: Placebo effects produce no real symptom changes
Placebo works by altering DNA permanently
Placebo responses can cause real perceived and measurable symptom improvements
quiz.answer: Placebo responses can cause real perceived and measurable symptom improvements

quiz.question: Which mechanistic insight explains why antioxidant supplements sometimes harm instead of help?
options: Antioxidants always improve cellular resilience without exception
Antioxidants convert into vitamins in the body
High-dose antioxidants can disrupt redox signaling and blunt adaptive responses to stress
quiz.answer: High-dose antioxidants can disrupt redox signaling and blunt adaptive responses to stress
